com.software.reuze

Interface mpb_i_InferenceSample

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    mpb_InferenceRejectionSampling, mpb_InferenceSampleGibbsAsk, mpb_InferenceSampleLikelihoodWeighting

    public interface mpb_i_InferenceSample
    General interface to be implemented by approximate Bayesian Inference algorithms.
    Author:
    Ciaran O'Reilly

    • Method Summary

      • ask

        mp_i_CategoricalDistributionIterator ask(mp_i_RandomVariable[] X,
                                       mp_PropositionTermOpsAssignment[] observedEvidence,
                                       mpb_i_Network bn,
                                       int N)
        Parameters:
        X - the query variables.
        observedEvidence - observed values for variables E.
        bn - a Bayes net with variables {X} ∪ E ∪ Y /* Y = hidden variables
        N - the total number of samples to be generated
        Returns:
        an estimate of P(X|e).
